Detailed Description

input/output management

The dual-pob board have 22 input/output pin free for use.

This pin are on PORTF, PORTB, PORTG and PORTE of the dual-pob cpu:

  • the PORTF pin 0 to 7, as digital input, digital output or analog input
  • the PORTB pin2, pin3 and pin7 as digital input/output
  • the PORTG pin0 to 4 as digital input/output
  • the PORTE pin 2 to 7 as digital input/output

Note:
Please note that only the PORTF can be use as analog input!
Example code: configure input/output pins
  UInt8 portb=0;
  UInt8 porte=0;

  // Set pin7 of PORTB as output (the other pin are set as input by default)
  portb = IO_AS_OUTPUT << PIN_7 ;

  // Set pin2 and pin7 of PORTE as output (the other pin are set as input by default)
  porte = (IO_AS_OUTPUT << PIN_2) | (IO_AS_OUTPUT << PIN_7 ); 

  // Finally, write the i/o configuration:
  SetIOWay(portb, porte,IO_AS_DEFAULT,IO_AS_DEFAULT);

Example code: set/clear an output pin
  // Set pin7 of PORTE to 1 during 1 second

  SetOutput(PORTE,PIN_7);

  Wait_Ms(1000);

  ClearOutput(PORTE,PIN_7);

Example code: Get value of input pin
  UInt8 value;

  // Get the pin value of PORTB
  value = GetInput(INPUT_PORTB,INPUT_1);

For advanced users, you can check the AVR-libc documentations at http://www.nongnu.org/avr-libc

Define Documentation

#define cbi ( REG8,
BITNUM   )     REG8 &= ~(_BV(BITNUM))

#define ClearOutput ( PORT,
PIN   )     cbi(PORT,PIN)

Clear output pin. Write a logical zero to output pin of the specified port.

Parameters:

  • PORT port's name: PORTF, PORTB, PORTG, PORTE
  • BIT pin's port to clear (PIN_0 to PIN_7)

#define sbi ( REG8,
BITNUM   )     REG8 |= _BV(BITNUM)

#define SetOutput ( PORT,
PIN   )     sbi(PORT,PIN)

Set output pin Write a logical one to the output pin of the specified port.

Parameters:

  • PORT port's name: PORTF, PORTB, PORTG, PORTE
  • BIT pin's port to set (PIN_0 to PIN_7)

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum _input_pin INPUT_PIN

Pin input number.

Use this enumeration with the GetInput() function.

typedef enum _input_port INPUT_PORT

Port input enumeration.

Use this enumeration with the GetInput() function.

typedef enum _io_pin IO_PIN

Pin ouput number.

Use only for the output functions: ClearOutput(), SetOutput() and the configuration function: SetIOWay().

typedef enum _io_settings IO_SETTINGS

IO pin settings.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum _input_pin

Pin input number.

Use this enumeration with the GetInput() function.

Enumerator:
INPUT_0  Get pin 0
INPUT_1  Get pin 1
INPUT_2  Get pin 2
INPUT_3  Get pin 3
INPUT_4  Get pin 4
INPUT_5  Get pin 5
INPUT_6  Get pin 6
INPUT_7  Get pin 7

enum _input_port

Port input enumeration.

Use this enumeration with the GetInput() function.

Enumerator:
INPUT_PORTB  PORTB
INPUT_PORTE  PORTE
INPUT_PORTF  PORTF
INPUT_PORTG  PORTF
INPUT_NONE  NONE

enum _io_pin

Pin ouput number.

Use only for the output functions: ClearOutput(), SetOutput() and the configuration function: SetIOWay().

Enumerator:
PIN_0 
PIN_1 
PIN_2 
PIN_3 
PIN_4 
PIN_5 
PIN_6 
PIN_7 

enum _io_settings

IO pin settings.

Enumerator:
IO_AS_INPUT  Set io pin as input
IO_AS_OUTPUT  Set io pin as output
IO_AS_ANALOG  Set io pin as analog input
IO_AS_DEFAULT  Default io settings: input

Function Documentation

UInt8 GetInput ( INPUT_PORT  port,
INPUT_PIN  pin 
)

Get input pin value.

Parameters:
port port where read the value
pin pin number of port
Returns:
the pin value: 0 or 1. if selected port is wrong, the function will return 0xFF.
